task.title: How to Divide Numbers
task.shortdesc: The instructions for using the division feature on the JPS Calculator app.

prereq.p: You must have the app installed and opened to divide numbers.

result.p: The result of the division equation is displayed.

example.p: You need to divide 5 from 10. The equation is 10รท5=2. Press 10. Then select (รท). Press 5. Then select (=).
The result 2 appears on the screen.
